dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me with this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me with this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? What's so funny about, uh, national service?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? What's so funny about, uh, national service?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: National service? It's conscription! Twenty thousand people, B, twenty thousand. They're just, like, taking them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: National service? It's conscription! Twenty thousand people, B, twenty thousand. They're just, like, taking them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, more than 20,000 Kazakhstanis will be sent to serve in the army, Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces Saken Zhusupov announced.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Taking them? They're, um, replenishing the ranks. It says right here, for defense. "Replenishing the ranks."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Taking them? They're, um, replenishing the ranks. It says right here, for defense. Replenishing the ranks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "By June 30, the ranks of the Armed Forces, other troops, and military formations will be replenished with more than 20,000 men aged 18 to 27 who have no grounds for deferment or exemption from conscription," Zhusupov said at a briefing at the Central Communications Service (CCS).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Replenishing? It's basically forced labor! Eighteen to twenty-seven, no grounds for deferment. No choice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Replenishing? It's basically forced labor! Eighteen to twenty-seven, no grounds for deferment. No choice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "...more than 20,000 men aged 18 to 27 who have no grounds for deferment or exemption from conscription," Zhusupov said...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, sometimes, uh, people need a little push to do their civic duty, right? A strong country needs a strong, uh, military. That's, that's just how it is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, sometimes, uh, people need a little push to do their civic duty, right? A strong country needs a strong, uh, military. That's, that's just how it is.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Civic duty? Are you serious? Forcing young men into uniform for, what, "core of the trained military reserve"? Sounds like, uh, cannon fodder to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Civic duty? Are you serious? Forcing young men into uniform for, what, core of the trained military reserve? Sounds like, uh, cannon fodder to me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Citizens who have completed compulsory military service form the core of the trained military reserve, which, if necessary, can be mobilized to defend our country," Zhusupov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Cannon fodder? No, no, it's a strategic necessity! What if, God forbid, something happens? We need a, a ready supply of trained personnel. Zhusupov said it himself, "defend our country."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cannon fodder? No, no, it's a strategic necessity! What if, God forbid, something happens? We need a, a ready supply of trained personnel. Zhusupov said it himself, defend our country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Citizens who have completed compulsory military service form the core of the trained military reserve, which, if necessary, can be mobilized to defend our country," Zhusupov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Defend our country" by ripping young people from their lives, their education, their careers? It’s completely archaic! This isn't the 1950s, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Defend our country by ripping young people from their lives, their education, their careers? It's completely archaic! This isn't the 1950s, A.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so we just, what, hope for the best then? Hope nobody ever, um, tries anything? That's, that's your grand plan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so we just, what, hope for the best then? Hope nobody ever, um, tries anything? That's, that's your grand plan?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My grand plan is voluntary service, professional armies! Not some, uh, government decree snatching 20,833 people! It's just... it's a huge waste.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My grand plan is voluntary service, professional armies! Not some, uh, government decree snatching twenty thousand, eight hundred thirty three people! It's just... it's a huge waste.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Defense, a total of 20,833 people are subject to conscription, including:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Waste? It's an investment! It’s, um, about national security, B! You can't just ignore these things. It's practical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Waste? It's an investment! It's, um, about national security, B! You can't just ignore these things. It's practical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Practical? It's terrifying, A! Imagine being 19 and suddenly your future is, like, decided for you.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Practical? It's terrifying, A! Imagine being nineteen and suddenly your future is, like, decided for you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a year or so, B. They learn discipline. They serve. It builds character.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a year or so, B. They learn discipline. They serve. It builds character.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Character? More like, uh, resentment and lost opportunities. No, this whole thing, it's just wrong.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Character? More like, uh, resentment and lost opportunities. No, this whole thing, it's just wrong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's absolutely necessary. This isn't just some casual decision. They need these numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's absolutely necessary. This isn't just some casual decision. They need these numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And I think it's a massive overreach and a terrible policy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I think it's a massive overreach and a terrible policy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I think it's a pragmatic and responsible one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I think it's a pragmatic and responsible one.
